titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lords assembled in high court of Parliament: the humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled. Together with an humble representation of the pressing grievances, and important desires of the well-affected freemen, and Covenant-engaged citizens, of the City of London.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
